original_text: I have not eaten any of this special food when I was weeping for someone who had died. I did not touched any of it while I was unclean. I have not offered any of it to give honour to a dead person. I have obeyed you completely. I have done everything that you commanded me to do.
korean_text: 내가 애곡하는 날에 이 성물을 먹지 아니하였고 부정한 몸으로 이를 떼어두지 아니하였고 죽은 자를 위하여 이를 쓰지 아니하였고 내 하나님 여호와의 말씀을 청종하여 주께서 내게 명령하신 대로 다 행하였사오니

sentences.original_text: I have not eaten any of this special food
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이 특별한 음식을 먹지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: when I was weeping for someone who had died
I did not touched any of it while I was unclean
sentences.korean_translation: 나가 부정할 때에도 그것을 만지지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: I have not offered any of it to give honour to a dead person
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 죽은 사람에게 영광을 주기 위해 그것을 바치지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: I have done everything that you commanded me to do
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신이 나에게 명령한 모든 것을 행했습니다
